Info.name: ComputationClass
Info.Description: The [ComputationClass] is the ComputationClass used for this job.

Info.name: Dataset
Info.Description: The [Dataset] is the Dataset used for this job.

Info.name: ContainersLoaded
Info.Description: The [ContainersLoaded] is the number of Yarn containers used for this job.

Info.name: ContainerSize
Info.Description: The [ContainerSize] is the heap size of Yarn containers used for this job.

Info.name: StartTime
Info.Description: The [StartTime] of an (abstract) operation is derived from the smallest value of [FilialStartTimes], which are [StartTime]s of all child operations.

Info.name: EndTime
Info.Description: The [EndTime] of an (abstract) operation is derived from the largest value of [FilialEndTimes], which are [EndTime]s of all child operations.

Info.name: Duration
Info.Description: [Duration] is derived from the difference in [StartTime] and [EndTime].

Info.name: BspTime
Info.Description: The [BspTime] is the execution time used for the actual BSP supersteps.

Info.name: ResourceAllocTime
Info.Description: [ResourceAllocTime] is the proportion of the total execution time used for resource allocation, which is equal to ([DeploymentDuration] + [UndeploymentDuration]).

Info.name: CoordinationTime
Info.Description: [CoordinationTime] is the proportion of the total execution time used for BSP coordination, which is equal to ([BspSetupDuration] + [BspCleanupDuration]).

Info.name: IOTime
Info.Description: [IOTime] is the proportion of the total execution time used for IO, which is equal to ([DataLoadTime] + [DataOffloadTime]).

Info.name: JobStartTime
Info.Description: The [JobStartTime] is the time when this job is started

Info.name: BspRatio
Info.Description: The [BspRatio] is the proportion of the total execution time used for the actual BSP supersteps, which is equal to [BspTime] / [TotalDuration].

Info.name: ResourceAllocRatio
Info.Description: [ResourceAllocRatio] is the proportion of the total execution time used for resource allocation, which is equal to [ResourceAllocTime] / [TotalDuration].

Info.name: CoordinationRatio
Info.Description: [CoordinationRatio] is the proportion of the total execution time used for BSP coordination, which is equal to [CoordinationTime] / [TotalDuration].

Info.name: IORatio
Info.Description: [IORatio] is the proportion of the total execution time used for IO, which is equal to [IOTime] / [TotalDuration].

Info.Summary: The [TopActor @ TopMission] operation is the top-level operation of each Giraph job. Info.name: SyncOverhead
Info.Description: [SyncOverhead] is the difference between the maximum and the average [Duration] of all Computation sub-operations. The intuition here is that the average [Duration] represents the optimal scenario, in which partitions are distributed in perfect balance. The extra time needed til the last Computation is done are therefore synchronization overhead.

Info.name: ActiveVertices

Info.Description: [ReceivedMsgVolume] is aggregated from [ReceivedMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.Description: [LocalMsgVolume] is aggregated from [LocalMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: RemoteMsgVolume
Info.Description: [RemoteMsgVolume] is aggregated from [RemoteMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: MaxReceivedMsgVolume
Info.Description: [MaxReceivedMsgVolume] is maximum of [ReceivedMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: SyncOverhead
Info.Description: [SyncOverhead] is the difference between the maximum and the average [Duration] of all Computation sub-operations. The intuition here is that the average [Duration] represents the optimal scenario, in which partitions are distributed in perfect balance. The extra time needed til the last Computation is done are therefore synchronization overhead.

Info.name: ActiveVertices

Info.Description: [ReceivedMsgVolume] is aggregated from [ReceivedMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.Description: [LocalMsgVolume] is aggregated from [LocalMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: RemoteMsgVolume
Info.Description: [RemoteMsgVolume] is aggregated from [RemoteMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: MaxReceivedMsgVolume
Info.Description: [MaxReceivedMsgVolume] is maximum of [ReceivedMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: SyncOverhead
Info.Description: [SyncOverhead] is the difference between the maximum and the average [Duration] of all Computation sub-operations. The intuition here is that the average [Duration] represents the optimal scenario, in which partitions are distributed in perfect balance. The extra time needed til the last Computation is done are therefore synchronization overhead.

Info.name: MaxReceivedMsgVolume

Info.name: SyncOverhead
Info.Description: [SyncOverhead] is the difference between the maximum and the average [Duration] of all Computation sub-operations. The intuition here is that the average [Duration] represents the optimal scenario, in which partitions are distributed in perfect balance. The extra time needed til the last Computation is done are therefore synchronization overhead.

Info.name: MaxReceivedMsgVolume
Info.Description: [MaxReceivedMsgVolume] is maximum of [ReceivedMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: SyncOverhead
Info.Description: [SyncOverhead] is the difference between the maximum and the average [Duration] of all Computation sub-operations. The intuition here is that the average [Duration] represents the optimal scenario, in which partitions are distributed in perfect balance. The extra time needed til the last Computation is done are therefore synchronization overhead.

Info.name: Vertices
Info.Description: [TotalNumVertices] is the global vertex count. This metric is already included in the standard implementation of Giraph.

Info.name: Edges
Info.Description: [TotalNumEdges] is the global vertex count. This metric is already included in the standard implementation of Giraph.

Info.name: SentMsgs
Info.Description: [SentMsgs] is aggregated from [SentMsgs]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: ActiveVertices
Info.Description: [ActiveVertices] is aggregated from [ActiveVertices]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: SentMsgVolume
Info.Description: [SentMsgVolume] is aggregated from [SentMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: ReceivedMsgVolume
Info.Description: [ReceivedMsgVolume] is aggregated from [ReceivedMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: LocalMsgVolume
Info.Description: [LocalMsgVolume] is aggregated from [LocalMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: RemoteMsgVolume
Info.Description: [RemoteMsgVolume] is aggregated from [RemoteMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: MaxReceivedMsgVolume
Info.Description: [MaxReceivedMsgVolume] is maximum of [ReceivedMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: SyncOverhead
Info.Description: [SyncOverhead] is the difference between the maximum and the average [Duration] of all Computation sub-operations. The intuition here is that the average [Duration] represents the optimal scenario, in which partitions are distributed in perfect balance. The extra time needed til the last Computation is done are therefore synchronization overhead.

Info.name: StartTime
Info.Description: The [StartTime] of an (abstract) operation is derived from the smallest value of [FilialStartTimes], which are [StartTime]s of all child operations.

Info.name: EndTime
Info.Description: The [EndTime] of an (abstract) operation is derived from the largest value of [FilialEndTimes], which are [EndTime]s of all child operations.

Info.name: Duration
Info.Description: [Duration] is derived from the difference in [StartTime] and [EndTime].

Info.name: Vertices
Info.Description: [TotalNumVertices] is the global vertex count. This metric is already included in the standard implementation of Giraph.

Info.name: Edges
Info.Description: [TotalNumEdges] is the global vertex count. This metric is already included in the standard implementation of Giraph.

Info.name: SentMsgs
Info.Description: [SentMsgs] is aggregated from [SentMsgs]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: ActiveVertices
Info.Description: [ActiveVertices] is aggregated from [ActiveVertices]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: SentMsgVolume
Info.Description: [SentMsgVolume] is aggregated from [SentMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: ReceivedMsgVolume
Info.Description: [ReceivedMsgVolume] is aggregated from [ReceivedMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: LocalMsgVolume
Info.Description: [LocalMsgVolume] is aggregated from [LocalMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: RemoteMsgVolume
Info.Description: [RemoteMsgVolume] is aggregated from [RemoteMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: MaxReceivedMsgVolume
Info.Description: [MaxReceivedMsgVolume] is maximum of [ReceivedMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: SyncOverhead
Info.Description: [SyncOverhead] is the difference between the maximum and the average [Duration] of all Computation sub-operations. The intuition here is that the average [Duration] represents the optimal scenario, in which partitions are distributed in perfect balance. The extra time needed til the last Computation is done are therefore synchronization overhead.

Info.name: SentMsgs
Info.Description: [SentMsgs] is aggregated from [SentMsgs]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: ActiveVertices
Info.Description: [ActiveVertices] is aggregated from [ActiveVertices]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: SentMsgVolume
Info.Description: [SentMsgVolume] is aggregated from [SentMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: ReceivedMsgVolume
Info.Description: [ReceivedMsgVolume] is aggregated from [ReceivedMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: LocalMsgVolume
Info.Description: [LocalMsgVolume] is aggregated from [LocalMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: RemoteMsgVolume
Info.Description: [RemoteMsgVolume] is aggregated from [RemoteMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: MaxReceivedMsgVolume
Info.Description: [MaxReceivedMsgVolume] is maximum of [ReceivedMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: SyncOverhead
Info.Description: [SyncOverhead] is the difference between the maximum and the average [Duration] of all Computation sub-operations. The intuition here is that the average [Duration] represents the optimal scenario, in which partitions are distributed in perfect balance. The extra time needed til the last Computation is done are therefore synchronization overhead.

Info.name: RemoteMsgVolume
Info.Description: [RemoteMsgVolume] is aggregated from [RemoteMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: MaxReceivedMsgVolume
Info.Description: [MaxReceivedMsgVolume] is maximum of [ReceivedMsgVolume]s of all children operation with mission type PostSuperstep.

Info.name: SyncOverhead
Info.Description: [SyncOverhead] is the difference between the maximum and the average [Duration] of all Computation sub-operations. The intuition here is that the average [Duration] represents the optimal scenario, in which partitions are distributed in perfect balance. The extra time needed til the last Computation is done are therefore synchronization overhead.
